name: df-acos
body: |- wceq(cacos, cmpt(s0, cc, co(co(cpi, cdiv, nat2), cmin, cfv(casin, cv(s0)))))
comment: Define the arccosine function. See also remarks for ~ df-asin . Since we define ` arccos ` in terms of ` arcsin ` , it shares the same branch points and cuts, namely ` ( -oo , -u 1 ) u. ( 1 , +oo ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Mar-2015.)
